name: deskmate
slogan: design, portable and efficient connected standing desk for everyone

team.name: Arthur Maisonnier
team.bioHtml: Co-founder at Billss (personal finance management 2.0) and Deskmate (affordable, design & efficient standing desk). Senior Analyst at Silverpeak. Engineer.

jobs.title: Growth Hacking Internship
jobs.description:
High level: 
Grow brand awareness to the roof + increase online traffic

Growth hacking:
- Find smart and efficient strategies to increase traffic & sales.
- Try these strategies.
- Improve and iterate on these strategies.

Requirements: 
- Perfect written English 
- Creative 
- Entrepreneurial mindset & ability to work independently

What you get: 
- A very innovative and entrepreneurial environment in the center of London in cool office space.
- Learn the craft of creating and executing marketing campaigns. 

Position to start ASAP.
